project.description:
This script triggers the SQLite update from MongoDB into SQLite: /opt/apps/batched/Python/3_ETL_Duckdb_Postgres
to trigger the main.py script poetry run python

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /opt/apps/batched/Python/3_ETL_Duckdb_Postgres if [ ! -f "poetry.lock" ]; then echo "poetry.lock not found. Running 'poetry install'..." poetry install else echo "poetry.lock found. Skipping 'poetry install'." poetry run python main.py --date_run='2023-11-23' --env_type='dev'
